metadata.name: Sequence 01
metadata.description:
Hello & Welcome to my first Open Edition on Manifold.xyz

The Collection - Each month I will release a new piece to mint for the same price of 0.09ETH. 
The art will vary from week to week, however I will aim to keep my (It’s all a simulation) theme present in each piece.  
As I learn and grow as an artist, so will this open edition collection. 

This Token – Sequence 01  
After some extensive research before my trip I listed this location in my top 5 places to visit. I was able to use my drone to capture the Blue Lagoon aka the (not so) secret beach. 
I could have stayed here for hours to watch this natural beauty.

Location - Nusa Ceningan a small island located between Nusa Lembongan and Nusa Penida, south of Bali, in Indonesia.

Enjoy!
